# ðŸ’™ Empathy

A Python package that spreads kindness and empathy, one install at a time.

## What is this?

This is a fun little package that displays encouraging messages and reminds us all to be kind to one another. When you install it, you'll be greeted with a heartwarming message!

## Installation

```bash
pip install empathy
```

## Usage

After installation, you can run the command-line tool:

```bash
empathy
```

This will display a random inspirational quote about empathy and kindness.

## Why?

Because the world needs more empathy. Every small reminder counts!

- ðŸ’¬ Random inspirational quotes about empathy
- ðŸ’™ Pure positivity, zero dependencies (well, except Python!)
